TEXT.S:
Gwei Lun-meiu siwkay niza Gwei Lun-mei, u tatayna a palaway nu Taywan. nalecuhan i 12 bulad 25 demiad, 1983 a mihca. namipalaw ku " semilaway a panan" sa, singangan tu i igaay. salungan ciniza, u palaw i makapah tu , sisa maala ku Kingma kawlah i Taywan. u Kingma iga kawlah sa, u sakapahay a iga kawlah i Taywan.
u sapuyaay a kakuniza u sulit nu Hulam 19831225-u sulit nu Amilika Gwei Lun-mei (born December 25, 1983) is a Taiwanese actress. She started her acting career in 2002, with the film Blue Gate Crossing.
u kawlah niza u uzip niza caay henay misulit.
